title: Booklish: The Simple, Comprehensive Guide to Successfully Writing and Publishing Your Book
description: Thinking about writing a book, but not quite sure where to start? Booklish is the most extensive and useful guide to book publishing on the market. The truth is there’s never been a better time for an author to be autonomous. The only problem is that the evolved publishing landscape has become exceedingly difficult to navigate. Constant changes, endless choices, information overload. Booklish is an impossibly concise guide for every stage of the writing and publishing process, complete with concrete action plans. Booklish makes your life easier by taking the guesswork out of publishing, advocating proven strategies and specific tools. Booklish is an extensive aggregation of information about successful publishing, built for those seeking definitive advice. In an age where anyone can publish a book, innovation is a paramount. Don’t waste your time dissecting the inordinately complicated world of books. Allow Booklish to guide you to success. Please visit bookacademy.co for more information.
author: Bookacademy
